scripts.build: pnpm --filter @mfe/shared run build && pnpm --filter './mfe-*' run build
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter @mfe/shared run build && concurrently -k -n shell,api,header,list,create -c blue,red,green,yellow,magenta "pnpm --filter shell run dev" "pnpm --filter api-todo run dev" "pnpm --filter mfe-header run dev" "pnpm --filter mfe-todo-list run dev" "pnpm --filter mfe-create-todo run dev"
scripts.start: pnpm run build && pnpm run dev
